nodes.bodyText:
could we run into multiple esrImportLines having the same C_Payment_ID? or are we ruling this out, e.g. with aunique contraint?
(or maybe the answer is in the code above?)

Yes, there's a unique index:
-- DROP INDEX public.esr_importline_payment_uq;

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX esr_importline_payment_uq
  ON public.esr_importline
  USING btree
  (c_payment_id)
  WHERE c_payment_id IS NOT NULL;
i think it's cleaner if you move this method into esrImportDAO..
